name: Engineering Enablement by Abi Noda | Building an internal developer platform at CVS Health | Jim Beyers (CVS Health)
summary: This week's episode is with Jim Beyers, VP of Engineering Enablement at CVS Health. Jim joined CVS a year ago to lead an effort to build an internal developer platform. Abi and Jim discuss how Jim joined CVS to build an internal developer platform, what brought him to the job, and how the...
